final_answer.final_answer:
Here is a list of top-rated movies sorted by IMDb rating in descending order, with their IMDb ratings and summaries:

1. **The Shawshank Redemption** (IMDb: 9.3)
   Summary: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

2. **The Godfather** (IMDb: 9.2)
   Summary: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

3. **The Godfather Part II** (IMDb: 9.0)
   Summary: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

4. **The Dark Knight** (IMDb: 9.0)
   Summary: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

5. **12 Angry Men** (IMDb: 9.0)
   Summary: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

These movies are among the highest-rated on IMDb. You can request more movies or apply additional filters if needed.

query: I want to find movies with high ratings. Can you provide me with a list of top-rated movies along with their IMDb ratings and summaries? Please sort the results by their IMDb ratings in descending order.

available_tools.name: List_Movies__With_RT_Ratings
available_tools.description: Returns the list with the Rotten Tomatoes rating included

available_tools.name: List_Movies__Order_By
available_tools.description: Orders the results by either Ascending or Descending order

available_tools.name: List_Movies__Sort_By
available_tools.description: Sorts the results by choosen value

available_tools.name: List_Movies__Genre
available_tools.description: Used to filter by a given genre (See http://www.imdb.com/genre/ for full list)

available_tools.name: List_Movies__Query_Term
available_tools.description: Used for movie search, matching on: Movie Title/IMDb Code, Actor Name/IMDb Code, Director Name/IMDb Code

available_tools.name: List_Movies__Minimum_Rating
available_tools.description: Used to filter movie by a given minimum IMDb rating

available_tools.name: List_Movies__Quality
available_tools.description: Used to filter by a given quality

available_tools.name: List_Movies__Page
available_tools.description: Used to see the next page of movies, eg limit=15 and page=2 will show you movies 15-30

available_tools.name: List_Movies__Limit
available_tools.description: The limit of results per page that has been set

available_tools.name: List_Movies__List_Movies
available_tools.description: Used to list and search through out all the available movies. Can sort, filter, search and order the results

answer_details.message:
Thought: The user wants a list of top-rated movies sorted by IMDb ratings in descending order, with ratings and summaries. The main tool to list movies is List_Movies__List_Movies, which can incorporate sorting and filtering. I need to set sort_by to "rating" and order_by to "desc" to achieve the requested sorting. I should also consider using a high minimum_rating to ensure "high ratings," but the user didn't specify a threshold, so I'll keep it low to include all movies. I'll use a reasonable limit to get a manageable list. I'll not use other tools like With_RT_Ratings or Genre as they aren't requested. I'll not finish yet because I need to fetch the data first.

{
  "action_weights": {
    "List_Movies__With_RT_Ratings": 0.01,
    "List_Movies__Order_By": 0.01,
    "List_Movies__Sort_By": 0.01,
    "List_Movies__Genre": 0.01,
    "List_Movies__Query_Term": 0.01,
    "List_Movies__Minimum_Rating": 0.01,
    "List_Movies__Quality": 0.01,
    "List_Movies__Page": 0.01,
    "List_Movies__Limit": 0.01,
    "List_Movies__List_Movies": 0.9,
    "Finish": 0.01
  },
  "action_args": {
    "List_Movies__With_RT_Ratings": {"with_rt_ratings": false},
    "List_Movies__Order_By": {"order_by": "desc"},
    "List_Movies__Sort_By": {"sort_by": "rating"},
    "List_Movies__Genre": {"genre": ""},
    "List_Movies__Query_Term": {"query_term": ""},
    "List_Movies__Minimum_Rating": {"minimum_rating": 0},
    "List_Movies__Quality": {"quality": ""},
    "List_Movies__Page": {"page": 1},
    "List_Movies__Limit": {"limit": 20},
    "List_Movies__List_Movies": {"sort_by": "rating", "order_by": "desc", "limit": 20, "minimum_rating": 0},
    "Finish": {"final_answer": null}
  }
}

[Fake] tool=List_Movies__List_Movies category=Video_Images api=List Movies args={'sort_by': 'rating', 'order_by': 'desc', 'limit': 20, 'minimum_rating': 0} | response={"error": "", "response": "{\"movies\": [{\"id\": \"tt0111161\", \"title\": \"The Shawshank Redemption\", \"imdb_rating\": 9.3, \"summary\": \"Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.\"}, {\"id\": \"tt0068646\", \"title\": \"The Godfather\", \"imdb_rating\": 9.2, \"summary\": \"The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.\"}, {\"id\": \"tt0071562\", \"title\": \"The Godfather Part II\", \"imdb_rating\": 9.0, \"summary\": \"The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.\"}, {\"id\": \"tt0468569\", \"title\": \"The Dark Knight\", \"imdb_rating\": 9.0, \"summary\": \"When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.\"}, {\"id\": \"tt0050083\", \"title\": \"12 Angry Men\", \"imdb_rating\": 9.0, \"summary\": \"A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.\"}]}"}

Thought: The tool returned a successful response with a list of top-rated movies, including IMDb ratings and summaries, sorted by rating in descending order. This matches the user's request. I can now provide this list to the user. I should call Finish with the final answer, presenting the movies clearly.

    "Finish": {"final_answer": "Here is a list of top-rated movies sorted by IMDb rating in descending order, with their IMDb ratings and summaries:\n\n1. **The Shawshank Redemption** (IMDb: 9.3)\n   Summary: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.\n\n2. **The Godfather** (IMDb: 9.2)\n   Summary: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.\n\n3. **The Godfather Part II** (IMDb: 9.0)\n   Summary: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.\n\n4. **The Dark Knight** (IMDb: 9.0)\n   Summary: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.\n\n5. **12 Angry Men** (IMDb: 9.0)\n   Summary: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.\n\nThese movies are among the highest-rated on IMDb. You can request more movies or apply additional filters if needed."}

watermark_trace.context_for_key:
User Query: I want to find movies with high ratings. Can you provide me with a list of top-rated movies along with their IMDb ratings and summaries? Please sort the results by their IMDb ratings in descending order.
Available Tools:
1. List_Movies__With_RT_Ratings [tool=List Movies, api=With RT Ratings]: Returns the list with the Rotten Tomatoes rating included
2. List_Movies__Order_By [tool=List Movies, api=Order By]: Orders the results by either Ascending or Descending order
3. List_Movies__Sort_By [tool=List Movies, api=Sort By]: Sorts the results by choosen value
4. List_Movies__Genre [tool=List Movies, api=Genre]: Used to filter by a given genre (See http://www.imdb.com/genre/ for full list)
5. List_Movies__Query_Term [tool=List Movies, api=Query Term]: Used for movie search, matching on: Movie Title/IMDb Code, Actor Name/IMDb Code, Director Name/IMDb Code
6. List_Movies__Minimum_Rating [tool=List Movies, api=Minimum Rating]: Used to filter movie by a given minimum IMDb rating
7. List_Movies__Quality [tool=List Movies, api=Quality]: Used to filter by a given quality
8. List_Movies__Page [tool=List Movies, api=Page]: Used to see the next page of movies, eg limit=15 and page=2 will show you movies 15-30
9. List_Movies__Limit [tool=List Movies, api=Limit]: The limit of results per page that has been set
10. List_Movies__List_Movies [tool=List Movies, api=List Movies]: Used to list and search through out all the available movies. Can sort, filter, search and order the results
You must pick one tool or Finish.
